```python
import os
print('environment variables')
print(os.environ)
```

<br>

```py
import os
print('environment variables')
print(os.environ)
```

<br>

```js
// code:js と書いてます
console.log('yeah!')
```

<br>

```javascript
// code:javascript と書いてます
console.log('yeah!')
```
